author: yorickdowne
content:
The difficulty bomb is trivial to delay or remove. The main thing it does is regularly exercise the entire release pipeline.

There is some discussion of having an ice age in PoS for that purpose. Has time though, there is such a busy roadmap that that release pipeline will get exercised often for years to come.

author: yorickdowne
content:
A fork of Ethereum that does not have a release pipeline at all is not a serious fork. So yeah, even a yolo fork needs at least one person who can be bothered to make a one-line change and hit the compile button.
If thatâ€™s a hurdle, it seems a reasonable one.
